content: Fires are less frightening today than they once were, because more and more houses are built of concrete, and concrete houses do not burn as easily as the old wooden ones.
translations: ita:Oggigiorno gli incendi sono meno spaventosi di com'erano una volta, perché sempre più abitazioni vengono costruite con i
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by AlanF_US (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
